Detailed Description

Authentication and related library functions.

Definition in file libauth.php.

Function Documentation

Authentication ( $  passwd  ) 

Authenticates session user with the password supplied.

Passwords are sha1 encrypted before passed to Controller, so the password string is never passed around plain text. This means double encryption in the password file, because Model encrypts again while storing into the file.

Parameters:
[in] $passwd string Password submitted by user

cwwui_syslog ( $  prio,
$  file,
$  func,
$  line,
$  msg 
)

Wrapper for syslog().

Web interface related syslog messages. A global $LOG_LEVEL is set in setup.php.

Parameters:
[in] $prio Log priority checked against $LOG_LEVEL
[in] $file Source file the function is in
[in] $func Function where the log is taken
[in] $line Line number within the function
[in] $msg Log message

HTMLHeader ( $  reloadrate = 0,
$  color = 'white' 
)

HTML Header without authentication.

Called by AuthHTMLHeader() after logout check, and also by Login page. Separate from AuthHTMLHeader() because Login page should not check logout naturally.

Parameters:
[in] $reloadrate Page reload rate, defaults to 0 (no reload)
[in] $color Page background, Login page uses gray

LogUserOut ( $  reason = 'User logged out'  ) 

Logs user out by setting session USER var to loggedout.

Redirects to the main index page, which asks for re-authentication.

Parameters:
[in] $reason string Reason for log message

Warning:
Relogin page should not time out

SetTopMenu ( $  view,
$  default = 'info.php' 
)

Sets session topmenu variable.

View object does not exists yet when this function is called in index.php files, hence the $view parameter.

Parameters:
[in] $view string Module name
[in] $default string Default topmenu selected
Returns:
string Selected topmenu
